column4: Heeeey... in xorg.conf, when it says "configured video device", where exactly is it configured? I need to change its config
xorg does autodetection by default, now. If you need to add manual configuration stuff, just add it to the file.
so it won't try to "reconfigure" it, every boot? Well, thank you :) :) :) Will try it
correct, settings you put in there override any autodetected ones.
